title: Sent in Pixel phone 2 months ago, Google will not send back... 45 "status update" emails from GStore
content:
Hello,

I'm not sure who to address this to, but I sent in my Pixel on on 10/2/20... 
This was after Google Store Support saying that they would replace it under warranty, and if I send my phone back in, within a week I would have my replacement.....
Well,,,,,, it has been 2 months now, and I have been ignored by chat repeatedly, and I am on aprox 40 chats back and forth with the "Our team is checking on it, will get a response in 24-48 hours..... Well,, in 24 -48 hours I get a copy/paste of the same message.....

Isn't 2 months a little much, when you promise 1 week???
Is this the new standard these days??

Thanks,
Dustin T
